meanings.definition: A sweet substance produced by bees from the nectar of flowers.
meanings.sent1: The honeys from the beehive tasted delicious on the toast.
meanings.sent2: The jar of honeys on the shelf was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The honeys in the garden were so busy making their sweet treat.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like honeys, soothing and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The honeys glistened in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: Affectionate or loving terms of endearment.
meanings.sent1: She whispered sweet honeys in his ear before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: Their conversation was filled with loving honeys and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The honeys they exchanged always brought smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled with joy at her affectionate honeys.
meanings.sent5: Their relationship blossomed with each exchange of loving honeys.

meanings.definition: To sweeten or make more appealing.
meanings.sent1: She used kind words to honeys the situation and calm everyone down.
meanings.sent2: Adding a touch of honey can honeys the flavor of the tea.
meanings.sent3: His charming smile never failed to honeys the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to honeys the air around them, making everything brighter.
meanings.sent5: A little bit of humor can honeys even the most serious of conversations.
